name: MySmartPod
summary: The best way to extend your mobile content experience onto the best quality screen and speakers
description:
Samsung Smart View SDK enables any mobile, tablet or PC to connect and communicate with Samsung Smart TVs and wireless speakers to provide seamless, immersive and engaging second screen experiences across all content services.

By using the API, you can extend your mobile application experiences to the connected TV or speakers. The SDK provides a flexible integration options; mobile APIs for Android and iOS, JavaScript APIs for web browsers, TV, and speakers. By using or downloading these files you agree to comply with, Samsung Privacy Policy (http://developer.samsung.com/privacy-policy) and Samsung Developer Terms and Conditions (http://developer.samsung.com/terms-and-conditions).
